select
from (A_ORG t1 inner join A_ORG_USER t2 on t1.id=t2.org_id) inner join A_USER t3 on t2.user_id = t3.id where t1.id=#{orgId}
and (t3.user_name like '%' || #{userName} || '%' or t3.login_name like '%' || #{userName} || '%')
order by t2.disporder
